titleText: Microsoft: We'll have two thirds of Office users in the cloud by fiscal2019
mainText: During Microsoft's most recent earnings call, officials said that commercial Office 365 revenues for the first time were greater than non-subscription/perpetual Office ones. Currently, according to Microsoft, more than half of all commercial (business) Office users.

titleText: Microsoft and Facebook's open AI ecosystem gains more support
mainText: Artificial intelligence has helped jump start everything from self-driving cars to soft robotics. As if that wasn't enough, it's also tearing down language barriers to bring the world closer together. But, at the same time,.

titleText: Microsoft just ended support for Office 2007 and Outlook 2007
mainText: Microsoft is urging customers still on Outlook 2007 and Office 2007 to upgrade as each of the products ran out of extended support on Tuesday. That means no more security updates, feature updates, support or technical.

titleText: Microsoft’s SDK for the Windows 10 Fall Creators Update now generally available
mainText: All developers interested in building apps for the Windows 10 Fall Creators Update can now download the software-development kit now that it is generally available, Microsoft announced Tuesday. First announced earlier this year at Microsoft Build,.

titleText: Microsoft sunsets Windows 10's first feature upgrade
mainText: Microsoft today will deliver the final security update for Windows 10's first feature upgrade, the version released in November 2015. Windows 10 1511 -- Microsoft labels its feature upgrades in a yymm format -- will receive.

titleText: With the end of Windows on phones, how does Microsoft avoid being the next IBM?
mainText: For fans of the platform, the official confirmation that Windows on phones isn't under active development any longer—security bugs will be fixed, but new features and new hardware aren't on the cards—isn't a big surprise..
